item.title: Clint the Stranger
item.description: Clint the Stranger, also known as Clint the Nevada's Loner, Nevada Clint and Clint, the Lonely Nevadan, is a 1967 Italian spaghetti western starring George Martin. A sequel entitled The Return of Clint the Stranger would follow in 1972.

item.title: A Genius, Two Partners and a Dupe
item.description: A Genius, Two Partners and a Dupe (Italian: Un genio, due compari, un pollo is a 1975 spaghetti western comedy film directed by Damiano Damiani and Sergio Leone, who directed the opening scene.

item.title: Paths of War
item.description: Paths of War is a 1970 Italian western-comedy film directed by Aldo Grimaldi.

item.title: Sartana the Gravedigger
item.description: I am Sartana, Your Angel of Death is a 1969 Italian Western film directed by Giuliano Carnimeo and starring Gianni Garko. The film is presented on some DVD reissues under its German title, Sartana - Töten war sein täglich Brot.

item.title: L'uomo che viene da Canyon City
item.description: Man from Canyon City is a 1965 Spanish-Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Alfonso Balcázar.
